item.title: Setting Up This Site
item.description: First there was a purely html site. I was about eleven. Then, there was the Wordpress blog (or maybe Blogger). I was probably about thirteen. After that came the social networks, Myspace, Bebo, Twitter, Facebook and Instagram, and then I decided I needed an actual blog for some reason. In my naivety I went for a full blown CMS stack, Mezzanine, a Django project. It took about a week solid, buying server space, setting up the entire site, finding a theme, tweaking the theme, breaking the theme, etc.
